Description: Egypt, full-length frontal portrait of adult male "policeman", wearing uniform, holding gun [?]. Outdoor setting. Medium: Gelatin silver print.
Producer name: Photographed by: John Frederick Clifford Hunt
Curator's comments: Geography: Belah not identified in sources. Circumstances: The Imperial War Museum holds photographs from the same collection with a more military content - see [HUN-] PIC DOC 66.
